website_summaries.verdict: FileMaker always delivers a beautiful aesthetic to database design and now new features lend tighter security and the ability to create uber Web-friendly custom apps. FileMaker Pro 13 is no exception, although it's frustrating that the company is ignoring Android and Windows Phone.
pros: Offers tools for creating beautiful custom apps
Create apps to run in Web browser
cons: Confusing online and built-in help resources
No Android or Windows Phone support
AES-256 encryption not available in Pro version

customer_reviews.title: Filemaker Pro 13
customer_reviews.text: FileMaker Pro works as advertised. Extremely expensive and capable far beyond my needs. It competently replaced the inexpensive but wonderful program "Bento 4" which Apple simply/cruelly discontinued. Imported other older dropped AppleWorks database files also. Beware that Apple does neither understands "history" nor a consumer's need to maintain business and personal files/records for more than 1 year. I live in constant fear that FileMaker will also suddenly disappear.
customer_reviews.author: David F. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: and web publishing questionnaires and the like it is almost a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Some of the features are gone from the last time I bought it for my old MAC, but still an exceptional database program. Very intuitive user interface. If you want to do web questionnaires and write stand alone apps get the more expensive version. It will furnish as complex reporting as you want to put together, and web publishing questionnaires and the like it is almost a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blaylock

customer_reviews.title: This Product is NOT UPGRADABLE!!!  Not a true FileMaker product!!
customer_reviews.text: Software loaded Fine and worked on my MacBookPro. But, on my iMac (both have the same OS) Software kept crashing. So I thought I would pay for the upgrade to FM17 and discovered the FM13 I purchased was not recognized by FileMaker, therefore "not upgradeable" I believe this software is from China
customer_reviews.author: James Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful OS is Correct for this product.
customer_reviews.text: he software in and of itself is fantastic. However, IT DOES NOT WORK WITH MAC OS HIGH SIERRA!!!
customer_reviews.author: Schmitto

customer_reviews.title: Last of the pay once versions
customer_reviews.text: I bought this version because I didn't want to pay a monthly fee to access my data. Filemaker is a great database application allowing me to quickly make useful collections of information. I use it to store lists of things, blog ideas, story ideas, details about hobbies, etc. It is flexible and intuitive. It is easy to use and the ability to be relational saves a lot on data duplication and improves drilling down. I've used Filemaker since version 4 and this version is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Bagnas

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Product did everything I needed. It upgraded Pro7 and made an Windows 7 file useable on Windows 10. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Sid

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded to FM 13 from FM 6 (by way of FM 9 trial) — works great!
customer_reviews.text: Recently upgraded from an old 11-yr old iMac to the latest desktop one and had to upgrade everything, including FM. I was using Filmaker Pro 6, and the support team and on-line notes were very helpful in suggestions for the upgrade path to the current version, FM 13. I downloaded the FM 9 trial, upgraded everything to that, then purchased FM 13, and upgraded everything again to that.... no problems noted so far!!! Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Had to spend lots of money to try to get them to integrate and still not very good, lots of glitches
customer_reviews.text: Didn't integrate well with our older versoin of Filemaker. Had to spend lots of money to try to get them to integrate and still not very good, lots of glitches.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Database manipulation for the masses
customer_reviews.text: I love FileMaker.. have used it for decades. So easy to design good databases and layouts, even a caveman could do it. -Signed, Zog
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent database program.
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to learn at first, but once over that it did everything I wanted in a database program.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Probably a good book, but I learn better from video.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy W. Timmerman

customer_reviews.title: Usability
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Filemaker since before the 90s. It was and is the most useable and understandable program I've ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: peter holtje

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent piece of software although it has a few frustrating limitations with the drop down lists.
customer_reviews.author: Karen van Rensburg

customer_reviews.title: Good databse
customer_reviews.text: I have used MS Access in the past, and am still on the beginning of the learning curve with Filemaker. Having said that, it meets all my expectations thus far, I've found the courses on lynda.com to be very useful in getting up to speed, otherwise it could have taken a lot longer to gain the required familiarity with the product.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Good program
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I rated it with 4 rather than 5 stars is because I have not had that much time to work with it. I know the program is good and works very well with both macs & pcs because we use it at work. It just takes a little time to figure out what and how you might want to do something. It is a very good program.
customer_reviews.author: G. Muenster

customer_reviews.title: While I love the product itself....
customer_reviews.text: While I love the product itself, something happened to my order in transit and I never actually received the product and ended up purchasing it elsewhere. Did not want to ding the product itself, but this is the one time that Amazon failed on it's delivery promise and then it took me some time and effort to sort it all out with them, as they couldn't seem to get it together.
customer_reviews.author: zkoolman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very powerful at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Filemaker Pro
customer_reviews.text: Received item on time, it is as I ordered. Having a number of glitches trying to get all of our old information to mesh with this version using OS 8.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: as always, great product
customer_reviews.text: its been several years since i used FMP, and so i upgraded at least 2 or 3 versions with FMP13. and what a difference a few years makes. if it isn't this should be the industry standard.
customer_reviews.author: cs2eye

customer_reviews.title: Still cannot use Dropbox with IOS devices without jumping through hoops.
customer_reviews.text: Oddly you cannot access a Dropbox data file from an iPad and save changes there. Filemaker go is the free app for iPad but it requires saving a Dropbox file to the IOS device which becomes a separate file from the one on Dropbox. Even stranger you then cannot save that new file to Dropbox from the IOS device. To use your own single user files on a PC and open the same file on an IOS device you must use Filemaker server. Unbelievable! Simple databases like 1Password work fine on multiple platforms using Dropbox but not Filemaker. It seems they don't want FileMaker apps to be easily shared.
customer_reviews.author: aaardvarj

customer_reviews.title: Great Update Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I tested the software on both Mac 10.9.2 and Windows 8.1 systems. The software installed without issues. Prior to using make sure you install the latest update for it so a SSL security bug is taken care of. The interface is still pretty much the same old Filemaker interface. So the learning curve really has not changed. After using both Access and Filemaker for the last decade or so it is my personal opinion that Filemaker seems a bit easier to learn to develop for. My only minor complaint is that the interface still looks a little tired. All in all this is great software though and is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Like the old days but even better
customer_reviews.text: I began using FileMaker back in the old Mac OS9 days when it was *the* Mac-based database product. It's been a long time since I've used but I didn't have to skip a beat. All the old familiar workflows are still there. It's like I never left. And yet, there's a whole lot more to it today, including hooks to iOS apps and the Internet. There are free open-source databases out there, like MySQL, but nothing with the ease of use to get you up and running right away. Whether you need it for your own use or for a workgroup or whole company, FileMaker Pro has features for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Domenico Bettinelli

customer_reviews.title: After 13 versions you would think the UI would be more polished
customer_reviews.text: The functionality of this software is good but after 13 versions I would really expect for the UI to be more polished, modern, and intuitive at this point. It still looks like software from years ago. And in 2014 the updater is not capable of doing a bug update internally. Instead, I have to be sent to the website where it forces me to download the entire version at 648.8 MB in order to go from 13.0v1 to 13.0v3. It would be funny if it wasn't so sad.
customer_reviews.author: frankfromnj

customer_reviews.title: Good and affordable software for small - medium enterprises or businesses
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly easy software to use, building customized databases suited to ones business needs especially small - medium sized companies. The software is very versatile and more powerful than MS Access, as you can even have a build in Client Relationship Management program within the database. You can create any amount of client data and information and map it according to your dashboard, user interface needs, and fit it into this software program. Moreover, it is compatible with both Mac and Windows so it doesn't have issues of users not being able to 'see' or retrieve information from the database created. Affordable software for small to medium enterprises.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't used FileMaker in over a decade. I'm amazed by how awesome it is - it's changed, I've changed, the universe has changed... but wow. While getting to know FileMaker again, I made a recipe database for personal use. It's even easier to use than I remember from way back when. The iPad app (FileMaker Go) connects beautifully. FileMaker lets you build a real relational database. More critically, it lets you easily and quickly build different views for different purposes or users.
customer_reviews.author: CCE

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: FileMaker Pro 13 was easy to use, easy to set-up and works exactly as it promises. My biggest criticism is that it's an arm and a leg for what it really does, which is rather simple. But it works, so if you need this type of solution, buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Peace Daddy

customer_reviews.title: FileMaker Pro
customer_reviews.text: FileMaker Pro is a great program. I haven't found many things it can't do! I use this instead of spreadsheets! It is easy to navigate, easy to get. Help if you get stumped. I have been using this program since the first computers were introduced for public use! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Susie L.

customer_reviews.title: Take Excel to the next level
customer_reviews.text: I am only beginning to understand the potential of this amazing program. Excel spreadsheets have never looked so good as when they were imported into this program. I can see that this program will help me teach concepts to my students in much more accessible ways. Additionally, the program is really intuitive and really fun to use. I really love this program and look forward to unlocking all of the possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: TINETQL

customer_reviews.title: This software is great, but the customer support is horrific
customer_reviews.text: This software is great, but the customer support is horrific. We found that everywhere we turned they wanted more and more money just to make their product function. As a small business, I do NOT recommend this at all. Other database software is a fraction of the cost of this one. AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: C. Andrew Semon

customer_reviews.title: A Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Way too labor intensive. All I wanted to do was integrate with Rally and export xml to create beautiful charts and reports. Doesn't import xml at least as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Taylor

product_meta.title: FileMaker Pro 13 - English
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC/Mac Disc

FILEMAKER PRO OVERVIEW
FileMaker Pro makes it easy to create custom solutions for managing business information on iPad, iPhone, Windows, Mac, and the web. Millions of people around the world use FileMaker Pro to streamline the way their teams manage contacts, track inventory, organize projects, and so much more.

GET STARTED QUICKLY
FileMaker Pro is so easy to use and includes so many features to help you get started quickly, you can have a new database ready to use in minutes, not hours or days. Every copy of FileMaker Pro, even the free 30-day trial, comes with a Getting Started tour that will have you up and running in no time.

 * Drag and drop Microsoft Excel files onto FileMaker Pro to create a database instantly.
 * Use the pre-designed Starter Solutions for managing contacts, tracking inventory, organizing projects, creating invoices, and more. Just import your data and customize the solution as you wish.

View larger CREATE CUSTOM SOLUTIONS WITH EASE
Use flexible design tools to make your database screens look and work just the way you want – all without programming.

 * Add fields to track whatever type of information you’d like, including names, numbers, dates, documents, prices, pictures, and more.
 * Choose from a wide variety of coordinated themes to give your solution a professional look.
 * Control fonts, colors, backgrounds, shading, and more. Even add your company logo to further customize your forms.
 * Connect your information together with the powerful Relationships Graph. For example, link customer data to invoices details.
 * Add buttons, scripts, calculations and pop-up lists to automate repetitive tasks and speed data entry.

ACCESS DATA ON THE GO
Go beyond the desktop and securely deliver FileMaker data to iPad and iPhone users for portable access while on the go.

 * Create custom database solutions in FileMaker Pro and run them in FileMaker Go for iPad and iPhone.
 * Add, edit, search, sort, and report on data on iPad and iPhone to instantly boost productivity for mobile users.
 * Host solutions with FileMaker Server, then instantly share in real-time with iPad and iPhone users.
 * Enable FileMaker WebDirect to access databases from web browsers.

View larger PRODUCE REPORTS AND CHARTS IN MINUTES
The built-in reporting and charting tools make it easy to produce informative and eye-catching summaries of your team’s data.

 * Produce custom reports that group, sort and summarize data in a way that’s most valuable to your organization.
 * Create pie charts, bar charts, bubble charts, line graphs and more.
 * Automatically email in PDF or Excel formats.

View larger SHARE WITH YOUR TEAM
FileMaker Pro allows you to share data over a network with up to 5 other people on iPad, iPhone, Windows, and Mac. Multi-platform support allows users on iPad, iPhone, Windows or Mac to access the same database at the same time. It includes advanced security options including user accounts, database passwords, field-level privilege sets, data encryption, and more.

INTEGRATE WITH INDUSTRY-STANDARD PROGRAMS
Import and export a variety of formats to eliminate duplicate data entry. Plus, create live two-way connections with external data sources.

 * Import and export a variety of formats, including .XLSX, .CSV, Tab, or XML.
 * Use the ODBC and JDBC standards to exchange and interact with data from other applications.
 * Connect with external SQL data sources including the latest versions of Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, and MySQL.
feature_bullets: FileMaker Pro 13 is powerful, easy-to-use software for creating custom business solutions that run on iPad, iPhone, Windows, Mac, and the web.
Drag and drop Microsoft Excel data into FileMaker Pro to get started. Or build a custom database for your unique needs.
Choose from one of 16 built-in Starter Solutions, professionally-designed templates, to manage contacts, invoices, assets and more.
Create a custom solution with flexible design tools to make your database screens look and work just the way you want -with no programming skills required.
Use built-in reporting and charting tools to make eye-catching summaries of your data. Even save your reports in popular Excel or PDF formats.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.7 out of 5 stars72 ratings2.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
